scripts.dispatcher: cross-env TYPE=dispatcher nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts --watch src
scripts.processor: cross-env TYPE=processor nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts --watch src
scripts.writer: cross-env TYPE=writer nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts --watch src
scripts.jobComplete: cross-env TYPE=jobComplete nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts --watch src
